CHAT.comment: Home Visit 1; took place in living room , MOT on floor beside CHI , late morning

u.a: gets up and goes to door
discussion ensues about whereabout of husband and GRF borrowing car
CHI has a mouthful of sandwich
MOT reading rapidly and with less expression
snaps book at CHI as if to catch him
walks over to his sandwich near the TV
walks over to get sandwich in front of T .V .
MOT does not interrupt reading or look at CHI
MOT read the above word by word with little expression without looking up although CHI was not there
MOT walks over to adjust T .V . then moves to the doorway
MOT goes out to speak with visitor
